name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I leverage advanced skills in **cloud technologies** including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, essential for developing automated solutions in the GenAI and ConversationalAI domains. My expertise encompasses **NLP**, **CRM** systems, and delivering automation and RPA solutions for seamless integration. Proficient in **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, I enable dynamic data interaction and enhance user experience through intelligent automation.

In my previous roles, I have successfully built high-performance applications that cater to healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My experience in full-stack development with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** ensures robust application lifecycle support.

My strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation allows me to construct secure and compliant solutions, adhering to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I have also developed machine learning pipelines, deploying ML models in production and orchestrating MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. With effective presentation and communication skills, I excel at relationship building and technical advising, ensuring stakeholder alignment and successful project execution.
